About.description: I am a Fullstack Developer specializing in Front-end, graduated in Software Engineering, and focused on developing web applications in the JavaScript ecosystem.

Projects.title: My projects
Projects.ecomm-project-description: Project representing a petshop ecommerce, with related products and services, dashboard for admin and also user account and cart pages.
Projects.taxi-lp-project-title: Landing Page - Adapted Transportation for Wheelchair Users
Projects.taxi-lp-project-description: Landing Page for booking taxi rides with services adapted for wheelchair users.
Projects.finances-project-description: Project simulating a finance management dashboard with personal monetary inflows and outflows
Projects.crud-project-description: Project simulating a user registration form with name, email, phone, and date of birth
Projects.memory-game-project-description: Project simulating a memory game with time tracking and move count
